titles.title: A bill to renew the temporary suspension of duty on 9,10-Anthracendione, 1-amino-4-hydroxy-2-phenoxy-.
A bill to renew the temporary suspension of duty on 9,10-Anthracendione, 1-amino-4-hydroxy-2-phenoxy-.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend temporarily the suspension of duty on 9, 10-Anthracenedione, 1-amino-4-hydroxy-2-phenoxy-.
